WO-IMPL-FIN-CREDIT-EXPANSION-TRACKING.title: Credit Expansion Tracking & Financial Module Debt Cleanup
WO-IMPL-FIN-CREDIT-EXPANSION-TRACKING.instruction_raw: Resolve M2 Delta by recording credit creation/destruction in MonetaryLedger. Bundle fixes for DRY excluded_ids, Government M2 exclusion, accounting gap, Bank hasattr coupling, hardcoded bond rate, and Settlement dark pool.
